content:
It's challenging for me to recommend specific skincare products as the availability and affordability may vary by location and time. However, some affordable skincare brands that include some of these popular ingredients in their products are:

1. The Ordinary: This is a popular brand that offers a range of affordable, high-quality skincare products. They have a wide selection of products that contain popular ingredients like Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Retinol, and Niacinamide. 2. CeraVe: CeraVe products are designed to be gentle, non-irritating, and suitable for sensitive skin. They offer a range of affordable skincare products that contain ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide. 3. Neutrogena: This is a brand that offers affordable skincare products that are widely available at drugstores. They have a range of products that contain popular ingredients like Salicylic Acid and Retinol. It is always recommended to read the label carefully and check the concentration and the additional ingredients in each product to avoid any adverse reaction. If you have specific skin concerns or are unsure which products would work best for your skin type, it's always best to consult a medical professional.
